name: Disable Registration Email
author: Mike Gogulski

sections.description:
Disable Registration Email for WordPress

Turns off the automatic “New user registration on your blog” email messages to the admin email address. Useful for large sites.

Usage

  • Nothing to configure. Simply activate and the emails stop coming!

License

Disable Registration Email is released into the public domain via the Unlicense.
sections.installation:
1. Download the Disable Registration Email plugin .zip file.
  2. Unzip the archive
  3. Upload the disable-registration-email folder to wp-content/plugins/.
  4. Go to the Plugins tab.
  5. Activate Disable Registration Email.

short_description: Disable Registration Email - Turns off the automatic "New user registration on your blog" email messages to the admin email address.
